pr_title: Fix issue 3526 Unlike "Items" tab, "child classes" tab does not display description nor image thumbnail

timeline.message: revert changes on this file, not finished with it yet
Fix Description for Child and Parent classes - issue 3526

timeline.bodyText: formatting a tiny bit off in this line, spaces after ,, no space before )
timeline.author: macgills

replies.author: vvijayalakshmi21

replies.bodyText:
it was just this part false,entityId ) that violated style. We want there to be spaces after ,s.
 false, entityId)
We also have our codestyle bundled with the project so if you were to highlight this section and press ctrl+alt+l it will do this for you. Unfortunately a lot of the project is not compliant with the style yet so you do have to go through the rigmarole of highlighting instead of just applying it to the entire file.
replies.author: macgills
